I died in the clock tower, because of the men that multiply themselves. Love this soundtrack, but for a long time the game creeped me out and now it doesn't. author: Postmita

text: It¬¥s called atmosphere. Konami themselves said that they were inspired by Super Metroid, and porbably they wanted to create an atmosphere in Castlevania: SOTN that is just as good as the atmosphere in Super Metroid, which they succeded in. Just like Super Metroid does the soundtrack play a big roll in creating an atmosphere. Castlevania: SOTN is truly a masterpiece, no doubt about it. It is as good as now as it was then back on it¬¥s release day. Aged like a fine wine.
